pageContext.claim: “A big part of my campaign: I want to bring our troops back from the endless wars. We have endless wars. They've been going on for 19 years in the area. But I'm going to bring them home from Syria. So I'm the only one that can do that and get bad publicity.”
pageContext.analysis: Much of the criticism was based on the abrupt withdrawal Trump announced, which risked destabilizing the region, not on the withdrawal itself. Tellingly, the administration has since stretched out the timeline for Trump's withdrawal.
